locsearch.localsearch.acceptance package¶

Submodules¶

locsearch.localsearch.acceptance.abstract_acceptance_function module¶

class locsearch.localsearch.acceptance.abstract_acceptance_function.AbstractAcceptanceFunction¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Template to create acceptance functions.

Acceptance functions determine if a worse solution than the current solution is accepted as the new current solution.

accept(current_solution)¶

Checks if the current_solution will be accepted

Parameters

current_solution : AbstractSolution The current solution.

Returns:The function returns true if the solution is accepted, the function returns false if the solution is rejected.
Return type:bool
